class tzdb_list;

{{tt|tzdb_list}} is a singleton list of {{lc|std::chrono::tzdb}}s, each of which represents a copy of the IANA time zone database. Users cannot construct a {{tt|tzdb_list}} and can only obtain access to one via the {{lc|std::chrono::get_tzdb_list}} free function.
